name: Collaboration County
description:
Watch a city unfold as citizens spend their days working and resting, natural disasters occur, gods are worshipped to avoid angering them, resources are gained and depleted, expeditions are sent out, and Collaboration County tries to survive.

Contributors:

  • Ronan Assor: Resources
  • Daniel Beale: 3D Assets
  • Alyssa Coetzee: Pedestrians
  • Justin Demmer: City Generation and Building Infrastructure
  • Marius Geldenhuys: Weather and Camera Controller
  • JC Theron:  Expeditions and Notification System
  • John Owhin: Religion
  • Rudi Naude: Public Services
  • Christiene van der Merwe: Wellness
  • Monica Zhou: Jobs
